title: Product Manager
description: ProductHub is looking for a Product Manager to lead our flagship product. You'll define product strategy, prioritize features, and work with engineering to bring products to market.
responsibilities: Design and implement product manager solutions that meet business requirements
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality products
Troubleshoot and resolve complex technical issues
Stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices
Contribute to documentation and knowledge sharing
requirements: 4+ years of experience in product manager or similar role
Strong knowledge of Product Strategy, Agile, Market Research
Experience with User Stories and Roadmapping
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field (or equivalent experience)
nice_to_have: Previous experience in a similar industry
education: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or equivalent experience
